screen.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_mana: Looks like you have not taken any screenshot yet!
screen.screenshot_viewer.delete_prompt.m: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot ? (it will be lost forever!)
screen.screenshot_viewer.delete_n_screen: Are you sure you want to delete these screenshots ? (they will be lost forever!)
screen.screenshot_viewer.rename_screensh: Enter a new name for your screenshot:
tooltip.screenshot_viewer.redirect_to_sc: Open screenshot in the Screenshot Manager...
tooltip.screenshot_viewer.menu_hint:
Right-click to manage 
Hit CTRL-C to copy to clipboard
config.screenshot_viewer.show_button_in_: Shows a button to access screenshots directly in the pause menu.
config.screenshot_viewer.show_button_on_: Shows a button to access screenshots directly on the title screen.
config.screenshot_viewer.enable_screensh: Whether a growing animation should play when a screenshot on the screen is clicked to be enlarged.
config.screenshot_viewer.prompt_when_del: Warns you with a confirmation screen when trying to delete a screenshot.
config.screenshot_viewer.initial_screens: Number of screenshots to be displayed per row when the screen is opened (from 2 to 8).
config.screenshot_viewer.screen_scroll_s: Scroll speed of the screen (from 1 to 50).
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: Background Opacity of the Screenshot Elements
Opacity of the background that appears when the screenshot elements are hovered (from 0 to 100).
config.screenshot_viewer.render_screensh: If a font shadow should be rendered under the screenshot elements text.
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: Color of the texts describing the screenshots elements.
config.screenshot_viewer.default_list_or: The ordering of the screenshots when the screen is opened.
config.screenshot_viewer.pause_menu_butt: The offset in pixels of the screenshot manager button if shown in the pause menu (from 0 to how much you want).
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshots_fol: The path to the folder containing the screenshots images that will be displayed in the screen.
config.screenshot_viewer.redirect_screen: If enabled, clicking on the link printed in the chat when taking a screenshot will open it directly in the screenshot manager.
config.screenshot_viewer.screenshot_elem: The visibility state of the screenshots names.
config.screenshot_viewer.invert_zoom_dir: If enabled, it inverts the scroll direction during zoom in the Screenshot Viewer menu
config.screenshot_viewer.display_hint_to: Controls whether a tooltip giving useful info should appear when hovering a screenshot for a prolonged period.
config.screenshot_viewer.render_wide_pro: Whether the properties buttons should be rendered wide or square.
config.screenshot_viewer.thumbnail_folde: The path to the folder containing the screenshots thumbnails that will be displayed in the screen.
config.screenshot_viewer.compression_rat: If set to none, will not generate any thumbnails. Controls the downscale ratio between a screenshot image and its thumbnail.
